name: Giftcard Reward
description: Automate the email of giftcards to eligible recipients

system-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured, you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox

project-settings.name:
GCR Project ID
This is the project containing all of the gift cards

GCR Event ID
If the Gift Card Repository is longitudinal, specify the numerical Event ID where the form resides
Leave blank for classical. Must be a number.

Gift Card Instance
Each of the fields below configure a single gift card event from this project.

sub_settings.name:
Reward Title
A descriptive name for this reward
(e.g. Baseline Complete)

Reward Logic
A gift card will be automatically awarded when this logic is true AND the ID field below is empty

Reward ID Field
Specify a field in this project where the ID of the Gift Card assigned to this reward will be stored

Reward ID Field Event
Specify the event where the id field above resides

Reward Amount
Specify the dollar amount for this gift card.
Only cards with a matching dollar amount from the GCR will be used.
If left blank, the next card from the GCR will be taken regardless of dollar value.

Reward Email Address
Enter the email address field from this project where the reward will be sent

Reward Email Subject
Enter the subject for the reward email.
Piping is allowed

Reward Email Header
Enter text to appear before the details of the reward in the body of the email.
Piping is allowed.

Forward Email Verification
(optional) If checked, prior to receiving the actual gift card details, the user will have to verify their email address.

Email Verification Subject
If Force Email Verification is checked, an email with this subject will be sent first.

Email Verification Header
If Force Email Verification is checked, this header will be prepended to the directions to access the gift card.

project-settings.name:
Alert Email
(optional) In the event gift cards are exhausted or any other error occurs, an email will be sent to this email address

Maximum Frequency
(optional) Enter a maximum number of gift cards to issue from this project in a 24 hour period. If the actual number exceeds this number, no more gift cards will be allowed and the alert-email above will be notified.
